message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While your offer is appreciated, the value of this product is quite high. I could meet you halfway at $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
